Articles.Content:
I've been messing with this most of last night and some of today.

Finally got it mostly working. The network around Kerbin seems failsafe, for now.

My deep orbit satellites have 4 dishes each. The lower orbit ones carry 2.

The only non functional ones at the moment are the ones around Minmus and Mun, because I didn't know what I was doing when I set them in orbit there. They have no dishes pointing home, so they can't be controlled to rectify. I'm sending out an unmanned mission that way with a Remote Command tomorrow to regain control and point a dish home.

One of the satellites at Minmus sports a couple of the super large dishes with a 900 Gm range(I think), to support my future long range missions.

Was quite a bit of work to set up, but also fun

The network from the Tracking Center

Low orbit sat design, and out at Minmus and Mun

One of the non-functioning sats orbiting Mun

Deep orbit satellite with 4 dishes

Edit: I seem to have lost my satellite with the large dishes. I'll have to put another one out to Minmus tomorrow as well.

Edited May 30, 2013 by Dortmunder
Can you post how you did that? Also can you post the satellite craft files? I really lack creativity.
